portfolio.subtitle: Every tattoo tells a story. Here are some of our favourites.

sessions.guarantee: 100% satisfaction guarantee or your deposit back

testimonials.quote: Marcus transformed my idea into something incredible. The attention to detail at Hammersmith Tattoo is unmatched.
testimonials.author: Sarah Chen

testimonials.quote: Been to many studios across London, but this is the only place I trust with my skin. Absolutely phenomenal work.
testimonials.author: James Mitchell

paragraphs: Marcus Stone has been creating stunning tattoos for over 12 years, establishing Hammersmith Tattoo London as one of West London's premier studios. With a background in fine arts and a passion for both traditional and contemporary styles, Marcus brings a unique perspective to every piece.

Our studio combines the industrial heritage of Hammersmith with cutting-edge artistry. We believe every tattoo should be a masterpiece that you'll be proud to wear for life. From intricate blackwork to vibrant colour pieces, we specialise in bringing your vision to reality.
about.callout: Every tattoo is a collaboration between artist and client, resulting in truly unique artwork.
about.imageAlt: Marcus Stone, lead tattoo artist at Hammersmith Tattoo London

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We recommend booking 2-4 weeks in advance for most pieces. Large custom work may require longer lead times for the design process.

items.question: What's your deposit policy?
items.answer: We require a £50 deposit to secure your appointment, which goes towards your final session cost. Deposits are non-refundable but can be transferred to a new date with 48 hours notice.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Create Your Masterpiece?
finalCta.subheadline: Book your consultation today and let's bring your vision to life

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo idea and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to discuss your design and schedule.
booking.successMessage: We'll contact you within 24 hours to discuss your design and confirm your appointment.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit will be required to secure your appointment
